description:
<U+2060>scale_*_steps<U+2060> creates a two colour binned gradient (low-high),
<U+2060>scale_*_steps2<U+2060> creates a diverging binned colour gradient (low-mid-high),
and <U+2060>scale_*_stepsn<U+2060> creates a n-colour binned gradient. These scales are
binned variants of the gradient scale family and
works in the same way.
example_call: scale_fill_stepsn(name = waiver(), ..., colours, values = NULL, space = "Lab",
